review: Compared to overwatch 1, this sorry excuse for a sequel is worse not because of the skin and transactions only, but in terms of hero balancing, in overwatch 1 most of the characters are well balanced but in overwatch 2 those fuckers at blizzard are just chucking whatever they can and see if it sticks, overall i rate this game blizzard/10
As pessoas que fazem pornÃ´ de Overwatch trabalham mais do que as pessoas que fazem Overwatch :)

Absolut gegen die Wand gefahren das Game

RIP pre Brigitte Ã„ra Overwatch

Played around 1k on b.net. Game deserves every negative review it gets. 
The monetization is outrageous.
Balance is awful with loads of aids characters being buffed/released. Devs don't play their own game.
PvE is a meme. Can't believe Jeff died for this. 
 
Core gameplay is still kinda fun but everything else around it is just awful.

You know you really â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥ up when players ask you to bring back LOOT BOXES.
As long as Bobby Kotick is in power, this company will never be the same old good Blizzard.

If you want to play a good hero shooter Overwatch is really good and i can only recommend the gameplay side of it but for the love of god don't give Blizzard any money. 

I love Overwatch but please don't make them get away with the shit they've pulled and don't reward them for it either. They might pull an Overwatch 3 and and stop developing this in like 3 years so be aware of that. You might also have to pay 20 bucks to play a game of Overwatch 3 so keep that in mind. 

Fuck Booby Fuckwit (Bobby Kotick)
It was a great game... WAS

This is just Overwatch 1 with more micro-transactions and 1 less player per team. They scapped the one thing that justified this game being a sequel, the PvE Hero Mode campaign. Instead, they are charging us $15 for individual story missions. No skill trees, no replayability, no effort to add anything new other than the battlepasses, skins, and new heroes that you have to pay for now. Great sequel Blizzard!

800 hours played between PC and switch. Just here for the memes. 

Bobby Kotick is a grade A tool.
